subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king built the Amber Fort?
question_hi: अमेरिका के एक्सी क्या अलादीन निर्माण करेंगे।
explanation_en: Alauddin Khilji, the الأفغانية Sultan, built the Amber Fort in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
